name: Wandering Hero - 2D Top Down
description:
I was interested in exploring the 2D Top Down genre so I decided to make a game in Unity. I learned how to code 2D top down movement, a shopping system, and a quest system. If you can, please test out this project as I am still learning Unity and game development and would appreciate anything helpful!

Art and sounds in this project were from free assets from various websites such as itch.io and freesound.org
